resources.string: Check out the Open Slider project!
The Open Slider project is an open source Android app and build instructions for a mechanical camera slider.
Thank you for installing Open Slider.

Open Slider is a project created by Greg Deeth to make it easy to build and control a camera slider from your PC or Android device while remaining open source so that anyone can customize the way it works for their own needs. A basic motorized slider can be built for under $200 and does not need any special tools or advanced knowledge. If you have a DIY 3D printer, you will be familiar with the required parts.
Being a lone developer on the side, support is nearly non existent. Please take advantage of the forum located in the menu to ask questions and post comments.
If you would like to know more about this project, please click on the link below for videos and documentation.
I\'ve worked hard on this project and if you feel it\'s a valuable tool, please consider a donation.
